assign.description: You were assigned to the issue.

invitation.description: You accepted an invitation to contribute to the repository.

manual.description: You subscribed to the thread (via an issue or pull request).

mention.description: You were specifically @mentioned in the content.

review_requested.description: You, or a team you're a member of, were requested to review a pull request.

security_alert.description: GitHub discovered a security vulnerability in your repository.

state_change.description: You changed the thread state (for example, closing an issue or merging a pull request).

team_mention.description: You were on a team that was mentioned.
